languages.text: {n}Абеляр прочищает горло.{/n} "{mf|Его|Ее} Светлость Вольный Торговец {name} фон Валанциус, наследни{mf|к|ца} величайшего протектората {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Простора Коронус{/g} и держатель{mf||ница} священного {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Патента{/g}, почтил{mf||а} Тассеру своим присутствием, дабы обсудить вопросы, касающиеся десятины..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Абеляр прочищает горло.{/n} "{mf|Его|Ее} Светлость Вольный Торговец {name} фон Валанциус, наследни{mf|к|ца} величайшего протектората {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Простора Коронус{/g} и держатель{mf||ница} священного {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Патента{/g}, почтил{mf||а} Тессеру своим присутствием, дабы обсудить вопросы, касающиеся десятины..."

languages.text: {n}Abelard clears his throat.{/n} "{mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} {name} von Valancius, inheritor of the greatest protectorate of the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g} and bearer of the sacred {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Warrant{/g}, has graced Thassera with {mf|his|her} presence in order to discuss matters pertaining to this planet's tithe—"

{n}Abelard clears his throat.{/n} "{mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} {name} von Valancius, inheritor of the greatest protectorate of the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g} and bearer of the sacred {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Warrant{/g}, has graced Thassera with {mf|his|her} presence in order to discuss matters pertaining to this planet's tithe—"

languages.text: {n}阿贝拉德清了清嗓子。{/n}“{name}·冯·瓦兰修斯大人，{g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}科罗努斯扩区{/g}最有影响力的王朝的继承人，神圣的{g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}贸易授状{/g}的持有者，正式驾临塔瑟拉，探讨这颗行星的什一税问题——”
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard clears his throat.{/n} "{mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} {name} von Valancius, inheritor of the greatest protectorate of the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g} and bearer of the sacred {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Warrant{/g}, has graced Thassera with {mf|his|her} presence in order to discuss matters pertaining to this planet's tithe—"

traits.locale_text: {n}阿贝拉德清了清嗓子。{/n}“{name}·冯·瓦兰修斯大人，{g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}科罗努斯扩区{/g}最有影响力的王朝的继承人，神圣的{g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}贸易授状{/g}的持有者，正式驾临塔瑟拉，探讨这颗行星的什一税问题——”

languages.text: {n}アベラルドは咳払いした。{/n}「{g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}コロヌス・エクスパンス{/g}最大の保護領を継ぐ者にして、聖なる{g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}令状{/g}の所有者、{name}・フォン・ヴァランシウス様が、この惑星の租税に関する議題を協議すべく、タッセーラにご臨席されました」
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard clears his throat.{/n} "{mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} {name} von Valancius, inheritor of the greatest protectorate of the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g} and bearer of the sacred {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Warrant{/g}, has graced Thassera with {mf|his|her} presence in order to discuss matters pertaining to this planet's tithe—"

traits.locale_text: {n}アベラルドは咳払いした。{/n}「{g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}コロヌス・エクスパンス{/g}最大の保護領を継ぐ者にして、聖なる{g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}令状{/g}の所有者、{name}・フォン・ヴァランシウス様が、この惑星の租税に関する議題を協議すべく、タッセーラにご臨席されました」

languages.text: {n}Abelard carraspea.{/n} «{mf|Milord|Milady} {name} von Valancius, {mf|heredero|heredera} del mayor protectorado de la {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Extensión de Koronus{/g} y {mf|portador|portadora} de la sagrada {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Patente{/g}, ha decidido honrar Thassera con su presencia a fin de discutir asuntos que atañen al diezmo del planeta...».
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard clears his throat.{/n} "{mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} {name} von Valancius, inheritor of the greatest protectorate of the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g} and bearer of the sacred {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Warrant{/g}, has graced Thassera with {mf|his|her} presence in order to discuss matters pertaining to this planet's tithe—"

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard carraspea.{/n} «{mf|Milord|Milady} {name} von Valancius, {mf|heredero|heredera} del mayor protectorado de la {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Extensión de Koronus{/g} y {mf|portador|portadora} de la sagrada {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Patente{/g}, ha decidido honrar Thassera con su presencia a fin de discutir asuntos que atañen al diezmo del planeta...».

languages.text: {n}Abelard boğazını temizliyor.{/n} "{g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Enginliği{/g}'nin en büyük protektorasının mirasçısı ve Kutsal {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Ruhsatname{/g}'nin Hamili olan {mf|Lord|Leydi} {name} von Valancius Hazretleri, bu gezegenin aşarıyla ilgili meseleleri görüşmek üzere Thassera'yı varlığıyla onurlandırmış bulunmaktadır."
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard clears his throat.{/n} "{mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} {name} von Valancius, inheritor of the greatest protectorate of the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g} and bearer of the sacred {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Warrant{/g}, has graced Thassera with {mf|his|her} presence in order to discuss matters pertaining to this planet's tithe—"

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard boğazını temizliyor.{/n} "{g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Enginliği'nin{/g} en büyük protektorasının mirasçısı ve Kutsal {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Ruhsatname'nin{/g} Hamili olan {mf|Lord|Leydi} {name} von Valancius Hazretleri, bu gezegenin aşarıyla ilgili meseleleri görüşmek üzere Thassera'yı varlığıyla onurlandırmış bulunmaktadır."

languages.text: {n}Abélard s'éclaircit la voix.{/n} « Sa Seigneurie {name} von Valancius, {mf|héritier|héritière} de plus grand protectorat des {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Étendues de Koronus{/g} et {mf|porteur|porteuse} de la {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}lettre de marque{/g} sacrée honore Thassera de sa présence pour discuter de questions relatives à la dîme de cette planète... »
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard clears his throat.{/n} "{mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} {name} von Valancius, inheritor of the greatest protectorate of the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g} and bearer of the sacred {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Warrant{/g}, has graced Thassera with {mf|his|her} presence in order to discuss matters pertaining to this planet's tithe—"

traits.locale_text: {n}Abélard s'éclaircit la voix.{/n} « Sa Seigneurie {name} von Valancius, {mf|héritier|héritière} de plus grand protectorat des {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Étendues de Koronus{/g} et {mf|porteur|porteuse} de la {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}lettre de marque{/g} sacrée honore Thassera de sa présence pour discuter de questions relatives à la dîme de cette planète... »

languages.text: {n}Abelard räuspert sich.{/n} "{mf|Seine Lordschaft|Ihre Ladyschaft} {name} von Valancius, {mf|Erbe|Erbin} des mächtigsten Protektorats der {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus-Ausdehnung{/g} und {mf|Träger|Trägerin} des heiligen {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Handelsbriefs{/g}, beehrt Thassera mit {mf|seiner|ihrer} Gegenwart, um über den Zehnt dieses Planeten zu sprechen ..."
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard clears his throat.{/n} "{mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} {name} von Valancius, inheritor of the greatest protectorate of the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g} and bearer of the sacred {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Warrant{/g}, has graced Thassera with {mf|his|her} presence in order to discuss matters pertaining to this planet's tithe—"

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard räuspert sich.{/n} "{mf|Seine Lordschaft|Ihre Ladyschaft} {name} von Valancius, {mf|Erbe|Erbin} des mächtigsten Protektorats der {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus-Ausdehnung{/g} und {mf|Träger|Trägerin} des heiligen {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Handelsbriefs{/g}, beehrt Thassera mit {mf|seiner|ihrer} Gegenwart, um über den Zehnt dieses Planeten zu sprechen ..."
